item.description:
Tom Caldwell and Bob Hayes will be completing their Winter 4's in One Season list on Mt Jackson.




We will meet at the Highland Center at 9:30 ( or join us at 8:30 for breakfast) and head out to the trailhead parking area at 9:45. Meet us there or at the trailhead for the Webster Jackson trail on Route 302 just south of the Highland Center. We will be on the trail at 10 AM Sharp.


Dogs are Welcome!


We will hike at or slightly slower than book time with plenty of short stops (in order to stay warm) for food and water. Plan on food/snacks that you can eat while moving.

We will be hiking to and from the summit via the Webster Jackson trail (Jackson Branch)

Please check your maps and AMC White Mountain Guide for a description of the peak/trails.

Distance 5.2 miles
Elevation Gain 2,150 feet
Book Time 2:40 excluding stops
Goal time 3:00 including stops

Anybody considering joining should be experienced in Winter hiking, be comfortable bushwhacking around blowdowns, and be knowledgeable in the proper Winter gear required for such an endeavor.

Be prepared for full Winter conditions - snowshoes, crampons, microspikes, goggles, extra gloves/clothes may all be needed - plan your hike accordingly based on your experiences.

If you have any questions on equipment or the hike please ask before showing up for the hike.


As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: In the Highland Center enjoying breakfast or gearing up in front of the fireplace
item.name: Mt Jackson - Double Winter 48 Finish
